page.title: 01AREA AT A GLANCE
page.content: Our Domesday project area covers a large area of{mixed farmland.}This farmland belongs to 4 overall land owners, who run their farms from one central farm. Most of the farmers in this area are{mixed arable}and {livestock,}the arable land being mainly{forage crops,}and the livestock,{cattle,sheep and pigs. There are also, dotted about the area,several{woods}with mixed {coniferous}and{deciduous}trees.{Eston {Bank}belongs to Langbaurgh Council and is used by the public for many{leisure {activities.}There is evidence along the Eston Bank hill line of disused {ironstone mines,}and{quarries}dating back to the early 1900's when this was a hive of{industrial activity.}Due to this activity some of the farmers have had to change from crops to{grazing due to{subsidence}from old workings.
